attributes.action: Dissolution of the Conservative party which has no place in modern society.
attributes.background: Time and again the Conservatives have mislead and abused the public's trust. For the sake of a better society they cannot be allowed to do politics anymore.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament does not have the power to dissolve the Conservative Party.
